name: bppwrite.github.io
description: the website of the bloomington playwrights project

scripts.build:all: npm run build:css && npm run build:js
scripts.build:css: npm run scss && npm run autoprefixer
scripts.third: mkdir static/js/lib/jquery && mkdir static/js/lib/slideout && cp node_modules/slideout/dist/slideout.min.js static/js/lib/slideout/slideout.min.js && cp node_modules/jquery/dist/jquery.min.js static/js/lib/jquery/jquery.min.js && cp -R node_modules/rxjs static/js/lib
